reviews.review: Mostly amazing. a few small lulls. occasionally one yuk to many. but still amazing.
Awesome movie nice fast pa ce and every hero gets there moment. Just non stop fun!
I can’t imagine what else you would want from the penultimate Avengers movie, other than the next one to come sooner.
It was okay! You should see it for yourself to have a real feeling
Marvel has the balls to pull out such an ending... respect from me.

Whew. Be sure to go to the bathroom before the movie starts because lots of unexpected stuff happens. Very fast 2.5 hours. Will see it again soon. Won't drink giaganic cola this time around. Holding my pee was the only bad part of movie.

Sooooo emotional. Every moment in this movie was packed with so much emotion. The result was an incredible combination of a satisfying and gut-wrenching feature. The only fault was the myriad plot points and the constant switching between these plot points in the first act of the movie, creating an uneven tone. The themes of sacrifice and revenge which have been recurring throughout the MCU are nuanced to perfection in this movie.

30-40 minutes overlong, numerous scenes that could have been cut, the thrill of seeing all the superheros on screen together wears out fast enough, and the average at best story leaves little room for imagination. Overhyped and overrated, this will be the last superhero film I see for sometime.

I'll be honestly if you are true Marvel fan and that has been waiting for this giant mash-up to hit the theaters and not just some critic looking at this just as some movie to bash, trust me when I say the 8 year was worth it(10 years from Iron Man when Nick Fury mentions the Avengers initative), Truly a mind blowing experience, speechless, thrilled feeling this movie will leave you. Anthony & Joe Russo (Directors of Captain America 2&3, including Avengers 3&4) have really given us everything in terms of what the MCU big baddie Thanos is suppose to be and bring. An epic that will go down in history and one for the books. #ThanosDemandsYourSilence
